Ludačka utakmica u Astani: Ristić brojao do 30, Zenit nadoknadio 19 poena, pa izgubio u produžetku (VIDEO)
Jedna od najboljih partija u karijeri srpskog košarkaša

04 Nov 2019

Neverovatna Astana i fantastični Dušan Ristić! Košarkaš Srbije bio je jedan od najzaslužnijih za pobedu kazahstanskog tima u meču VTB lige protiv Zenita, koji je na kraju rešen pogotkom Ajzeje Vajtheda za tri poena u poslednjem napadu u produžetku - 109:108.
Mnogi su sa skepticizmom reagovali na informaciju da će nekadašnji košarkaš Crvene zvezde karijeru nastaviti u dalekoj Astani, ali on iz utakmice u utakmicu pokazuje da se tamo nije našao slučajno. Danas je na to stavio konačni pečat, ubacivši neverovatnih 30 poena za svoj tim, a pritom uhvativši još pet lopti za čak 42 minuta provedena na terenu. Faktički, srpski igrač je na klupi proveo samo tri minuta.
Još impresivnije deluju svi ovi podaci kada se naglasi da je Ristić danas imao svega tri promašaja iz 17 pokušaja. Čak 12 puta je pogađao za dva poena, dok je sa distance bio perfektan ubacivši trojku u oba navrata.
I sve se nekako poklopilo da se to desi u prilično ludoj utakmici protiv Evroligaša - Zenita. Astana je krenula jako od samog starta, preuzela je prednost od prvog minuta i uspevala je da je održi na solidnom nivou kroz čitav prvi kvartal, a onda je usledila prava pravcata furija u drugih deset minuta košarke.



Tim iz Sankt Peterburga je prišao na samo tri poena zaostatka, što kao da je razljutilo ekipu Dušana Ristića, koja je uzela zalet i iz dve manje serije uspela da dođe do 18 poena prednosti na poluvremenu. Činilo se da će do kraja sve biti samo jednosmerna ulica i laka pobeda kazahstanskog tima, ali...
Prosto je teško ne zapitati se šta se desilo sa Astanom u trećem kvartalu. Imali su domaći igru i uspevali su da održe prednost, ali je Zenit potom počeo da pogađa sa distance. Mic po mic, prednost se topila, a pred poslednjih deset minuta igre iznosila je svega jedan poen.
Međutim, zanimljivo je da tim iz Sankt Peterburga ni u četvrtoj četvrtini ni u jednom trenutku nije uspevao da povede. Išla je Astana i na plus sedam na samo 45 sekundi pred kraj meča, ali su onda proradili košarkaši Zenita.
Ostin Holins je prvo prednost smanjio na samo četiri poena trojkom, da bi potom Mateuš Ponitka na šest sekundi pred kraj doveo meč na samo jedan posed. Naravno, gosti su pravili faul, na liniju slobodnih bacanja poslali Ajzeju Vajtheda, koji je promašio samo jedno bacanje i u tom trenutku bio označen kao tragičar. Kažemo to, jer je Hvostov nakon toga pogodio trojku za potpuno erupciju oduševljenja u gostujućem taboru. Meč je otišao u dodatnih pet minuta.
Дмитрий Хвостов спасает @zenitbasket и переводит игру в Нур-Султане в овертайм!Dmitry Khvostov hits the game tying 3 to keep Zenit alive and send it to overtime! pic.twitter.com/p4YVB2dtOh— VTB United League (@VTBUL) November 4, 2019
I došao je Zenit po prvi put do prednosti u dodatnih pet minuta, činilo se da imaju meč u rukama, pošto su pred poslednji napad Astane imali plus dva, ali tada je na scenu stupio upravo Ajzeja Vajthed.
Amerikanac se u potpunosti iskupio za promašeno slobodno bacanje, zategao je trojku sa osam metara i pogodio je kao kap za delirijum navijača na tribinama. Imao je Zenit još pet sekundi da odreaguje i eventualno dođe do pobede, ali su Kvostov i Ponitka bili neprecizni.



Astana je tako došla do druge pobede u VTB ligi u četiri odigrana meča, dok je Zenit vezao i četvrti uzastopni poraz, pa se sada više ne nalazi ni na mestu koje na kraju sezone vodi u plej-of. Moraće sastav iz Sankt Peterburga ozbiljno da se grupiše, ukoliko želi da se i sledeće sezone izbori za mesto među najboljima.

VTB LIGA

Crazy match in Astana: Ristic counted to 30, Zenit added 19 points and lost in overtime (VIDEO)
One of the best games in the career of a Serbian basketball player

04 Nov 2019

The amazing Astana and the fantastic Dusan Ristic! Serbia's basketball was one of the most responsible for the victory of the Kazakh team in the VTB league match against Zenit, which was eventually resolved by a hit by Isaiah Whitehead by three points in the last overtime attack - 109: 108.
Many reacted with skepticism to the information that the former Red Star basketball player would continue his career in faraway Astana, but he shows from game to match that he did not find himself there by accident. He put the final stamp on it today, racking up an incredible 30 points for his team, catching five more balls in 42 minutes on the court. In fact, the Serbian player spent only three minutes on the bench.
More impressive is the fact that all of this information is emphasized when it is emphasized that Ristic had only three misses from 17 attempts today. He scored two points 12 times, while he was perfect from distance, throwing a three on both occasions.
And it all kind of coincided that it would happen in a pretty crazy game against Euroleague Zenit. Astana started strong from the start, took the lead from the first minute and managed to keep it at a solid level throughout the first quarter, followed by a straight fourier in the other ten minutes of basketball.



The team from St. Petersburg came in just three points behind, which seemed to annoy Dusan Ristic's team, which took a run and managed to get 18 points into halftime from two smaller series. It seemed that by the end it would be just a one-way street and an easy victory for the Kazakh team, but ...
It's just hard not to wonder what happened to Astana in the third quarter. They had a home game and managed to maintain the lead, but Zenit then started to drive from distance. Mic by mic, the advantage was melting, and before the last ten minutes of the game it was only one point.
However, it is interesting that the team from St. Petersburg never managed to take the lead in the fourth quarter. Astana went seven plus in just 45 seconds before the end of the match, but then the Zenit basketball players worked.
Austin Hollins reduced the first advantage to just four points with a three-pointer, then put Mateusz Ponitka six seconds ahead to put the match on just one possession. Of course, the visitors made a foul, sent to Isaiah Whitehead on the free throw line, who missed just one throw and was tagged as a tragic at that point. We say this because Hvostov afterwards hit a threesome for a complete eruption of delight in the away camp. The match went in an extra five minutes.
Dmitry Khvostov saves @zenitbasket and translates the game into Nur-Sultan in overtime! Dmitry Khvostov hits the game tying 3 to keep Zenit alive and send it to overtime! pic.twitter.com/p4YVB2dtOh— VTB United League (@VTBUL) November 4, 2019
And for the first time Zenit came to the advantage in an extra five minutes, they seemed to have the match in their hands, as they had a plus two before the last Astana attack, but then it was Isaiah Whitehead who came on the scene.
The American fully redeemed himself for a missed free throw, tightened up an eight-yard triple and hit it as a drop for delirium fans in the stands. He had Zenit with five seconds left to react and eventually win, but Kvostov and Ponitka were inaccurate.



Astana thus came to the second victory in the VTB league in four matches played, while Zenit tied for the fourth consecutive defeat, so now it is no longer in the place which leads to the playoffs at the end of the season. The St. Petersburg squad will have to be seriously grouped if it is to win the top spot next season.
